Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
12.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
10.01.2011 SH SR16115 Reduced total number of parameters from 34 to 3 for submit
of BDC200 if has to be scheduled to run at next working day
28.04.2010 SH SCR15481 Added GSET_YESNO(6021) = Y to call the new version of
ODC200A and test on existing TCSV rows to skip call,of BDC200 (start match)
21.03.2010 GB SCR15377 Changed expresions if Button - Start match is start
23.08.2007 SH SCR12835 Changed button "Excel" into "Park" incl. procedures and
removed german ESW handling
15.06.2007 SH SCR12631 Changed calc of "Number test", "Number to match"
//12.07.2005 EE SCR#8635 fixed bug with update TESD
//11.03.2005 EE SCR#7630 fixed bug with email
08.03.2005 SH SCR7912 If GSET_YESNO = 'Y' (GSET_ID=81) then the test on
DCLN_INTERNETREQUEST = blank/NO will be omitted now
//01.03.2005 EE SCR#7630 CSV-File with changes as Email, changed clear of TESW/
HBABN to remote command
//04.01.2004 EE SCR#7545 stop processing if counter of importlines=0
//29.12.2004 EE SCR#7545 problem with null values solved
//29.12.2004 EE SCR#7592 changed update position TESD='FINISHED'
added 2 add. parms for call remote cmd (CPF,..)
//26.11.2004 EE SCR7160 allow also files with one row for ESW,....
//10.11.2004 EE SCR7160 ESW-Handling established for DE
08.10.2004 SH SCR7144 Extended selection of DCLN with DCLN_INTERNETREQUEST
= N, blank, NULL
//07.10.2004 EE SCR7160 ESW-Handling established for DE
//02.06.2004 EE SCR3193 Pushbutton handling
16.04.2004 SH SCR6000 Added part to delete related DCNA rows for deleted DCLN
- rows
04.12.2003 SH SCR4920 Added test that a match could be only started, if it's not
- still running
18.06.2003 RR SCR3807 Changed the test on counter from 1000 to 2500
30.05.2003 SH SCR3649 Call GB701 "Start match" outside of transaction
18.03.2003 RR SCR3173 Add "Delete"-Button and "Start Match"-Button
09.12.2002 SH Since SP4 the behaviour of transactions changed, so far as we know
- and therefore we had to change the transaction begin from "On record lock" to
- "Before task prefix"in the online task
-- The problem occured if
-- the transaction begin is set on record level
-- CALLPROG() will be used
-- The CALLPROG() program used Direct-SQL
The behaviour is a result of a combinations, as described above
1. Call ODC200B only for DCLN rows which are performed -->
DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED = 'Y'
2. Rename column "Number to match" in "Number to test" and
display count DCLN where DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED = N
3. Rename column "Finished" in "Number to match" and
- display count DCLN where DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED = Y
29.04.2002 SH SCR 1196 New field DCLN_RUNNUMBER
-- uses to call ODC200B, BDC200, BDC200DD
Pushbutton handling
Pushbutton handling
-- Range on DCLN_INTERNETREQUEST has to be omitted if GSET_YESNO (81) = 'Y', see
online task, where all distinct DCLN rows will be displayed
-- New File
-- Modify new debtors
-- Start Match
-- Start Match with time and date
-- Park new debtors

ExpSyntax.val: 'DCLN_INTERNETREQUEST is null or DCLN_INTERNETREQUEST='&''''&''''&' or DCLN_INTERNETREQUEST='&''''&'N'&''''

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DCLN_ADMNO, DCLN_CLNTNO, DCLN_RUNNUMBER, COUNT(*) FROM :1 WHERE :2 GROUP BY DCLN_ADMNO, DCLN_CLNTNO, DCLN_RUNNUMBER ORDER BY DCLN_ADMNO, DCLN_CLNTNO, DCLN_RUNNUMBER

Text.val: -- Need to positon the cursor, if no records exist, because the
-- virtuals on screen doesn't have to be modified
-- Parameter
-- New File = 'N'
-- Delete
-- Start Match
-- Park
... maybe BDC200DD is finished and DCLN rows are already deleted but because of
no refresh in online task it's possible to start BDC200DD again although the
DCLN rows are already deleted, so check if DCLN rows exists
-- BDC200DD already started for selected DCLN row
-- OK = 'O' --> Call ODC 200B
-- Cancel = 'C'
-- Refresh
-- Error: Please wait until the file is ready
-- Error: Match already started, do not start the match again ...
-- Match could be started, it's not running ...
INI.FACTORLINKLIB <> FLPROD
count <= 1500 and time < '17:00'
count <= 3000 and time < '16:00'
count <= 4500 and time < '15:00'
count <= 6000 and time < '14:00'
count <= 7500 and time < '13:00'
count <= 9000 and time < '12:00'
count <= 10500 and time < '11:00'
count <= 12000 and time < '10:00'
count <= 13500 and time < '09:00'
-- Delete Record
-- Delete related DCNA rows
-- Strip parameters
-- Check if job is already started
-- END TASK CONDITION --> Number to match = COUNTER(0)
-- TRUE, if a DCLN - row is locked for this USER, then called ODC200B,
-- otherwise we jump to the next row with the unique combination of
-- DCLN_ADMNO, DCL_CLNTNO and try to lock this row for the USER
-- and so on.....!
-- If the USER pressed in ODC200B the Button Cancel, the LOOP over
-- all DCLN-rows, with the unique combination DCLN_ADMNO, DCL_CLNTN
-- will be aborted
-- Try to lock DCLN - row
-- only when a DCLN - row is locked for this USER call ODC200B
-- update v.DCLN_NO with v.DCLN_NO + 1 to look for the next row
-- Attention: Locking strategie = On Modify, because it's possible
-- an other USER locked this row, he is working with this DCLN-row
-- in ODC200B
-- Checks if the DCLN-row locked by an other USER, than it's not
-- possibly to lock the row for this USER
-- only when DCLN-ACTIVEUSER <> '' or DCLN-ACTIVEUSER = USER(0)
-- it's possible to lock the row exclusive for this USER

Header.Description: Get next DCLN row and lock row

Text.val: -- The actual row will be locked immediately for the USER who will
-- work with this DCLN - row.
-- In ODC200B, onl only after pressing Button 'Cancel' or pushing
-- key 'Esc', the row will be unlocked. Otherwise the row will be
-- deleted, when it's stored in the real DATABASE.
-- Lock row exclusive for the USER, who will work with it

FormName.valUnicode: Get next DCLN row and lock row
